segments.text: I am observing an indoor kitchen, a line drawing in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is diligently drying a plate at a single-basin sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She wears a knee-length dress and an apron, suggesting a routine task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the sink itself; water is running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is overflowing, and water cascades over the front onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is forming around her feet, and one foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, her attention remains fixed solely on the plate, her face completely neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it astonishing that she seems utterly unaware of the growing flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The waste of water is quite frankly annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene makes me feel a bit disheartened by her complete absorption.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a bizarre situation unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the mess and potential damage this will cause.
segments.speaker: PAR
